data.headline: US stock futures edge up in quiet premarket ahead of January payrolls report, expected to show 55,000–75,000 job gains and 4.4% unemployment
bullets: Traders watching for possible prior payrolls revisions that could impact Fed June rate-cut expectations, the dollar, yields, and gold
Sentiment remains cautious after recent weakness in software and financials, and flat December retail sales
Sharp post-earnings declines in Mattel, Lyft, Moderna, and Robinhood weigh on risk appetite
Premarket movers include Shopify, Cloudflare, Lyft, Moderna (after FDA setback), Ford, and Zillow reacting to earnings and news
Upcoming earnings from McDonald’s, Kraft Heinz, and Cisco in focus for further market direction
